body:
See https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/28679, https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/28721, https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/72167, and https://github.com/onnx/onnx#prerequisites

I'm honestly not 100% sure about these requirements, but I think this is closer to the correct dependency versions. The version of the ONNX submodule was updated between the PyTorch 1.9 and 1.10 releases, which fixed builds with newer protobuf but broke builds with older protobuf. We previously didn't have any minimum version reqs for numpy/typing-extensions, so I think this is an improvement.
title: py-torch: restrict deps based on ONNX
